UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Roles of the Conserved Amino Acid Residues in Reduced Human Defensin 5: Cysteine and Arginine Are Indispensable for Its Antibacterial Action and LPS Neutralization.
Literature.Author: Chen F, Tang Y, Zheng H, Xu Y, Wang J, Wang C

Literature.Title: Reduction Impairs the Antibacterial Activity but Benefits the LPS Neutralization Ability of Human Enteric Defensin 5.
Literature.Author: Wang C, Shen M, Zhang N, Wang S, Xu Y, Chen S, Chen F, Yang K, He T, Wang A, Su Y, Cheng T, Zhao J, Wang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35(LD50=16.6±0.7µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(LD50=28.7±2.9µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(LD50=6.5±0.8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(LD90=12.9±1.3µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(LD50=7.9±1.1µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(LD90=19.5±1.6µg/ml)
